trans-unit.source: Initializes the associated <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle*> with a.NET Context Exchange-based correlation, subject to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism> specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化关联<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle*>制约基于上下文交换相关，使用者<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism>指定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ContextExchangeMechanism> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle*>

trans-unit.source: A context correlation is based on the context exchange mechanism described in the [.NET Context Exchange Protocol Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163882).
trans-unit.target: 上下文相关基于中所述的上下文交换机制[.NET 上下文交换协议规范](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163882)。

trans-unit.source: To use context correlation a context-based binding such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding> must be used.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用上下文相关的基于上下文的绑定如<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding>， <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding>，或<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding>必须使用。</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpContextBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpContextBinding> </xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpContextBinding>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.ContextCorrelationInitializer"></xref> class.
